thread.title: BRIEF-ChineseAll Digital Publishing Group to buy 80 pct stake in Morning Tec for 1.5 bln yuan via cash, share issue

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ChineseAll Digital Publishing Group to buy 80 pct stake in Morning Tec for 1.5 bln yuan via cash, share issue

organizations.name: chineseall digital publishing group co ltd

text:
Feb 2 (Reuters) - ChineseAll Digital Publishing Group Co Ltd :
* Says it plans to buy 80 percent stake in Morning Tec, a game culture company, for 1.5 billion yuan via cash, share issue
* It will hold 100 percent stake in target company after transaction
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/TcToFi
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
